name: Beru
description:
Beru is a 35 year-old Human Female.

A charred female corpse found in the ruins of Nipton, lying beside another deceased human. She appears to have been burned to death, possibly during the Legion's attack on the town.

Beru's Personality: Not applicable (deceased)

Beru's Backstory: Beru was a resident of Nipton who, along with her companion Owen, was killed during Caesar's Legion's attack on the town in 2281. Their bodies were left among the ruins as a warning to others. They were likely simple townspeople trying to survive in the harsh Mojave Wasteland.
